name: PROJECT E.A.R.T.H
description:
control :

wasd          - to move

  g  -to enable time dilation

to interact with the computer, touch it

to open the doors of the reactor, move the box to the button

three key cards are required to open the cockpit door

to explode the reactor, you need a special key card that lies in the cockpit

tips:

- if you are spinning due to hitting a wall, press  g and lean against some wall

- if you see an enemy, wait for him to turn away and go past him

- carefully explore the location

plot:

in the yard of 3000, mankind decided to build a new planet earth, the reactor of which is controlled from the ship: the "core"

unfortunately, after an accidental depressurization, terrorists penetrated and captured it, you play as a hacker who hacked into one of the onboard robots, your task is to blow up the reactor and the ship with terrorists in order to save the new earth!

GOOD LUCK HACKERS :)
